mapper.select:
SELECT a.CBSE07,a.CBSE08,b.CBCA08,c.CBWA09,d.CALA08,a.CBSE18,a.CBSE11,a.CBSE01,a.CBSE11 from CBSE a LEFT JOIN CBCA b on a.CBSE09=b.CBCA01 LEFT JOIN CBWA c on c.CBWA01=a.CBSE10 LEFT JOIN CALA d on d.CALA01=a.CBSE16 where a.CBSE06=0
and date_format(a.CBSE08,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{params.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(a.CBSE08,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{params.endTime},'%y%m%d')
and c.CBWA09 = #{cbwa09} and a.cbse07 = #{cbse07} and b.cbca08 = #{cbca08} and a.CBSE11 = #{cbse11}
